page.title: 15NEW MINISTER FOR FAIFLEY
page.content: The Rev. John Dillon took charge as the new minister of Faifley Church following a special induction service on Tuesday 4th of June.The Rev. Stewart Borthwick of Abbotsford Church welcomed over 380 guests. The Robing Ceremony was conducted by the wife of Faifley's Session Clerk Mrs. James Murray. Before his arrival the congregation of Faifley Parish had voluntarily decorated the manse for the Rev. Dillon and his wife Liz.,who is a nursing sister, and he thanked them for that before the close of the service. Faifley Church has a special feature inside.There is a small chapel dedic- ated to the people of Clydebank who died during the Clydebank Blitz.The strange thing about it is that it was built by Germans as a symbol of peace.
